verses.verse: <S%G2532>And<s%> as <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G1607>went<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%>, <S%G1520>one<s%> of <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3101>disciples<s%> <S%G3004>saith<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, <S%G1320>Master<s%>, <S%G2396>see<s%> what <S%G4217>manner<s%> of <S%G3037>stones<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G4217>what<s%> <S%G3619>buildings<s%> are here!

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G2036>said<s%> unto <S%G846>him<s%>, Seest <S%G991>thou<s%> <S%G5025>these<s%> <S%G3173>great<s%> <S%G3619>buildings<s%>? there <S%G863>shall<s%> <S%G3364>not<s%> be <S%G863>left<s%> one <S%G3037>stone<s%> <S%G1909>upon<s%> <S%G3037>another<s%>, <S%G3739>that<s%> <S%G2647>shall<s%> <S%G3364>not<s%> be thrown <S%G2647>down<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> as <S%G846>he<s%> <S%G2521>sat<s%> <S%G1519>upon<s%> the <S%G3735>mount<s%> of <S%G1636>Olives<s%> over <S%G2713>against<s%> the <S%G2411>temple<s%>, <S%G4074>Peter<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2385>James<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G2491>John<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G406>Andrew<s%> <S%G1905>asked<s%> <S%G846>him<s%> <S%G2596>privately<s%> <S%G2398><s%>,

<S%G1161>And<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G611>answering<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> <S%G756>began<s%> to <S%G3004>say<s%>, Take <S%G991>heed<s%> <S%G3361>lest<s%> <S%G5100>any<s%> man <S%G4105>deceive<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%>:

<S%G1063>For<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%> shall <S%G2064>come<s%> <S%G1909>in<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3686>name<s%>, <S%G3004>saying<s%><S%G3754>,<s%> <S%G1473>I<s%> <S%G1510>am<s%> Christ; <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G4105>deceive<s%> <S%G4183>many<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> take <S%G5210>heed<s%> <S%G991><s%> to <S%G1438>yourselves<s%>: <S%G1063>for<s%> they shall <S%G3860>deliver<s%> <S%G5209>you<s%> <S%G3860>up<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G4892>councils<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G4864>synagogues<s%> ye shall be <S%G1194>beaten<s%>: <S%G2532>and<s%> ye shall be <S%G2476>brought<s%> <S%G71><s%> <S%G1909>before<s%> <S%G2232>rulers<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G935>kings<s%> for <S%G1700>my<s%> <S%G1752>sake<s%>, <S%G1519>for<s%> a <S%G3142>testimony<s%> against <S%G846>them<s%>.
<S%G2532>And<s%> the <S%G2098>gospel<s%> <S%G1163>must<s%> <S%G4412>first<s%> be <S%G2784>published<s%> <S%G1519>among<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1484>nations<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> the <S%G80>brother<s%> shall <S%G3860>betray<s%> the <S%G80>brother<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> <S%G2288>death<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G3962>father<s%> the <S%G5043>son<s%>; <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5043>children<s%> shall rise <S%G1881>up<s%> <S%G1909>against<s%> their <S%G1118>parents<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G2289>cause<s%> <S%G846>them<s%> to be put to <S%G2289>death<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> ye shall <S%G2071>be<s%> <S%G3404>hated<s%> <S%G5259>of<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men <S%G1223>for<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> name's <S%G1223>sake<s%> <S%G3686><s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> he that shall <S%G5278>endure<s%> <S%G1519>unto<s%> the <S%G5056>end<s%>, the <S%G3778>same<s%> shall be <S%G4982>saved<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G3752>when<s%> ye shall <S%G1492>see<s%> the <S%G946>abomination<s%> of <S%G2050>desolation<s%>, <S%G4483>spoken<s%> of <S%G5259>by<s%> <S%G1158>Daniel<s%> the <S%G4396>prophet<s%>, <S%G2476>standing<s%> <S%G2476><s%> <S%G3699>where<s%> it <S%G1163>ought<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%>, (let him that <S%G314>readeth<s%> <S%G3539>understand<s%>,) <S%G5119>then<s%> let <S%G5343>them<s%> that be <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G2449>Judaea<s%> <S%G5343>flee<s%> <S%G1519>to<s%> the <S%G3735>mountains<s%>:

<S%G1161>And<s%> let <S%G2597>him<s%> that is <S%G1909>on<s%> the <S%G1430>housetop<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> go <S%G2597>down<s%> <S%G1519>into<s%> the <S%G3614>house<s%>, <S%G3366>neither<s%> <S%G1525>enter<s%> therein, to <S%G142>take<s%> any <S%G5100>thing<s%> out <S%G1537>of<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G3614>house<s%>:

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1994>let<s%> him that <S%G5607>is<s%> <S%G1519>in<s%> the <S%G68>field<s%> <S%G3361>not<s%> <S%G1519>turn<s%> <S%G1994><s%> <S%G3694>back<s%> <S%G1994>again<s%> for to take <S%G142>up<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G2440>garment<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G1508>except<s%> that the <S%G2962>Lord<s%> had <S%G2856>shortened<s%> those <S%G2250>days<s%>, <S%G3756>no<s%> <S%G3956><s%> <S%G4561>flesh<s%> should <S%G302>be<s%> <S%G4982>saved<s%>: <S%G235>but<s%> <S%G1223>for<s%> the elect's <S%G1588>sake<s%>, <S%G3739>whom<s%> he hath <S%G1586>chosen<s%>, he hath <S%G2856>shortened<s%> the <S%G2250>days<s%>.

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> <S%G1437>if<s%> any <S%G5100>man<s%> shall <S%G2036>say<s%> to <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G2400>Lo<s%>, <S%G5602>here<s%> is <S%G5547>Christ<s%>; <S%G2228>or<s%>, <S%G2400>lo<s%>, he is <S%G1563>there<s%>; <S%G4100>believe<s%> him <S%G3361>not<s%>:

<S%G1063>For<s%> false <S%G5580>Christs<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> false <S%G5578>prophets<s%> shall <S%G1453>rise<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall <S%G1325>shew<s%> <S%G4592>signs<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G5059>wonders<s%>, <S%G4314>to<s%> <S%G635>seduce<s%>, <S%G1487>if<s%> it were <S%G1415>possible<s%>, <S%G2532>even<s%> the <S%G1588>elect<s%>.
<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G991>take<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> <S%G991>heed<s%>: <S%G2400>behold<s%>, I have <S%G4280>foretold<s%> <S%G5213>you<s%> all <S%G3956>things<s%>.

<S%G235>But<s%> <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G1565>those<s%> <S%G2250>days<s%>, <S%G3326>after<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2347>tribulation<s%>, the <S%G2246>sun<s%> shall be <S%G4654>darkened<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> the <S%G4582>moon<s%> <S%G1325>shall<s%> <S%G3756>not<s%> <S%G1325>give<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G5338>light<s%>,

<S%G2532>And<s%> <S%G5119>then<s%> shall he <S%G649>send<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G32>angels<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> shall gather <S%G1996>together<s%> <S%G846>his<s%> <S%G1588>elect<s%> <S%G1537>from<s%> the <S%G5064>four<s%> <S%G417>winds<s%>, <S%G575>from<s%> the uttermost <S%G206>part<s%> of the <S%G1093>earth<s%> <S%G2193>to<s%> the uttermost <S%G206>part<s%> of <S%G3772>heaven<s%>.

<S%G1161>Now<s%> <S%G3129>learn<s%> a <S%G3850>parable<s%> <S%G575>of<s%> the fig <S%G4808>tree<s%>; <S%G3752>When<s%> <S%G846>her<s%> <S%G2798>branch<s%> <S%G1096>is<s%> <S%G2235>yet<s%> <S%G527>tender<s%>, <S%G2532>and<s%> putteth <S%G1631>forth<s%> <S%G5444>leaves<s%>, ye <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G2330>summer<s%> <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1451>near<s%>:

<S%G3779>So<s%> <S%G5210>ye<s%> in like <S%G2532>manner<s%>, <S%G3752>when<s%> ye shall <S%G1492>see<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> come to <S%G1096>pass<s%>, <S%G1097>know<s%> <S%G3754>that<s%> it <S%G2076>is<s%> <S%G1451>nigh<s%>, even <S%G1909>at<s%> the <S%G2374>doors<s%>.

<S%G281>Verily<s%> I <S%G3004>say<s%> unto <S%G5213>you<s%>, <S%G3754>that<s%> <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G1074>generation<s%> <S%G3928>shall<s%> <S%G3364>not<s%> <S%G3928>pass<s%>, <S%G3360>till<s%> <S%G3739><s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> these <S%G5023>things<s%> be <S%G1096>done<s%>.
<S%G3772>Heaven<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> <S%G1093>earth<s%> shall pass <S%G3928>away<s%>: <S%G1161>but<s%> <S%G3450>my<s%> <S%G3056>words<s%> <S%G3928>shall<s%> <S%G3364>not<s%> pass <S%G3928>away<s%>.

<S%G1161>But<s%> <S%G4012>of<s%> <S%G1565>that<s%> <S%G2250>day<s%> <S%G2532>and<s%> that <S%G5610>hour<s%> <S%G1492>knoweth<s%> no <S%G3762>man<s%>, no, <S%G3761>not<s%> the <S%G32>angels<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> are <S%G1722>in<s%> <S%G3772>heaven<s%>, <S%G3761>neither<s%> the <S%G5207>Son<s%>, <S%G1508>but<s%> the <S%G3962>Father<s%>.
